resources:
AboutMeлю Tolkyn Yellow star Hi, my name is Tolkyn Tyuyebayeva!

 

I was born in 2002, July 31.

I have two sisters, one and ten years old 

I was born in Petropavlovsk,and now I live in Nursultan 

Graduated from the NIS of the city of Petropavlovsk 

At school, I was active student, participated in creative activities, volunteered and was a group leader 

Now I am second year student of Astana IT University in the specialty Software Engineering 

I am creative person, so I have a lot of different hobbies

 I love reading books, reading fills me with inspiration

 I can draw, and play guitar though not quite professionally

 

Bye!

 Second star What is your Nickname? DONE
